title: Support Model
text:
The Modern Data Platform was designed by AxeTech to be owned by the customer and hosted in their own cloud environment.
As AT-MDP is scalable and flexible it can be used in a variety of support models. The most common configuraiton is outlined below.



Role
Entity




Design and build
AxeTech


Installation
AxeTech


Cloud hosting
Customer


Backup
Customer


Support and maintenance
Customer


Data analyts
Customer



Customers can request an alternative support model as part of the initial engagement process.

title: Tech stack
text:
The AxeTech Modern Data Platform (AT-MDP) includes industry leading analytics and data management products.
Key components of the platorm include:

Databricks
Azure hosted databases and storage
AWS hosgted databases and storage
Machine Learning and AI
Inegration with common BI apps like Tableu, Qlick, PowerBI and more

AT-MDP is highly scalable and adaptale so it can quickly connect to your data and be used by your existing presentation tools.

title: Intro
text:
The AxeTech Modern Data Platform (AT-MDP) provides a dedicated environment for organsiations to quickly gain insights from their data.
Key benefits of the Modern Data Platform include:

AT-MDP can be built within the customers own cloud environment for complete control and ease of integration with data.
Automatically scales to your usuage and you only pay for what you use.
Is fast to setup allowing customers to start working with their data sooner.
Leverages industry leading vendors and methodologies.
Data security and governance structures are included to help manage how data is accessed.

If you want a platform that provides access to your data quickly and securely so you can get on with exploring and understanding your business then AT-MDP is for you.

title: Getting Started
text:
Pre-requisites
To ensure a smooth installation we recommend the following is in place before the scheduled installation.

Internal stakeholder are identified.
New cloud subscription created.
Installation accounts created for new subscription.
Details of datasets and locations captured.



Kick-off meeting
(duration 1/2 day)
Customer stakeholders meet with the AxeTech MDP installation team to work through details specific to the customer environment. Duration 2 hours


Offsite configuration
(duration 2 days)
Based on information collected during the kick-off meeting the MDP automated installation will be finalised.


Environment creation
(duration 2 days)
The AxeTech installation team will deploy the MDP into the customerâ€™s cloud subscription.


Data integration
(duration 2 days)
Data sources identified by the customer during kick-off will be connected to MDP.


Validation and testing
(duration 2 days)
The AxeTech installation team will work with customer data specialists to confirm the environment is ready for use.


Training
(duration 2 days)
To help customers familiarise themselves with the environment several training workshops are provided


Handover and go-live
(duration 1 day)
The customer takes ownership of the environment and commences the first analytics tasks.

title: About
text:
This site provides reference information for users of the AxeTech Modern Data Platform.
For more information you can contact the team at AxeTech via their website
